content.rendered:
I.T. Internship for B.E./Diploma/MCM/BCA students

Vmaxinfo Instituteoffers internship for all students from I.T. stream like B.E./Diploma Engineering, MCM, MCA, BCS, etc. Vmaxinfo Instituteis renowned I.T. services providing company and training institute in Pune. The company has trained more than 10,000 students till now. The company has completed plenty of projects in information technology. We also offer placement assistance to students for their career development. Students can internship after completion of college or while pursuing college.

Internship in punein following area

  • Web Design
  • Web Development
  • Android Application Development
  • PHP MySQL projects
  • .net applications
  • Software Testing
  • Core Java and Advance Java
  • Python
  • Arduino and Robotis
  • IoT based projects
  • Artificial Inelegance (AI) projects
